=== Overridden virtual functions
==== _physics_process
.$Gimmicks/Stage2/Strawberry
```gdscript
func _physics_process(_delta: float) -> void:
	if player:
		var target := player.global_position + Vector2(-100, -100)
		%Pivot.global_position = %Pivot.global_position.lerp(target, 0.1)
```
.$Player
```gdscript
func _physics_process(delta: float) -> void:
	var dx := Input.get_axis(&'move_left', &'move_right')
	var dy := Input.get_axis(&'move_up', &'move_down')
	var direction := Vector2(dx, dy)
	var last_state := state
	state = compute_state(delta, direction)
	match state:
		State.CLIMBING:
			dx = 0
			velocity.y = dy * CLIMBING_SPEED
		State.DASHED:
			velocity = direction.normalized() * DASH_SPEED
		State.DASHING:
			velocity *= DASH_ATTENUATION * delta
		State.EXHAUSTED:
			dx = 0
		State.FAILED:
			velocity.x = lerp(velocity.x, 0.0, 0.2)
			velocity.y = lerp(velocity.y, 0.0, 0.2)
		State.FALLING:
			if last_state == State.CLIMBING \
			and dy < 0:
				velocity.y = JUMP_VELOCITY * 0.8
			else:
				if velocity.y < JUMP_VELOCITY * 0.85:
					velocity.y += GRAVITY * 1.15 * delta
				else:
					velocity.y += GRAVITY * delta
		State.JUMPED:
			velocity.y = JUMP_VELOCITY
		State.LOCKED:
			dx = 0
			velocity = Vector2(0, 0)
		_: pass
	
	if not playable: dx = 0
	if not (state == State.DASHED or state == State.DASHING):
		if dx: velocity.x = dx * SPEED
		else: velocity.x = move_toward(velocity.x, 0, SPEED)
	
	animate(playable)
	move_and_slide()
```
==== _ready
.$Player
```gdscript
func _ready() -> void:
	playable = true
	turn_right()
	if not owner: return
	if last_owner_name == owner.name:
		position = restart_position
	else:
		restart_position = position
	last_owner_name = owner.name
```


=== Instantiators
CAUTION: No other scene instantiate this scene.

=== link:/scripts/src/chapters/1/chapter_1.gd[chapter_1.gd]

```gdscript
extends Control


func restart() -> void:
	%Strawberry.reset()


func _on_player_failed() -> void:
	restart()

```
